long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
COCO is a moderation tool that warns you when any link on your google search/news, or article in your twitter feed, or webpage contains factually incorrect/misinformation.

COCO does this by maintaining an index of urls that stores information about whether a url contains misinformation/factually incorrect information. The index is maintained at scale using crypto-economic incentives and with help of a moderation committee. 

Download COCO to make sure that you what you read online is free of misinformation & is factually correct.
